welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Quarrata, Italy! Known for its charming streets and rich history, we invite you to explore and immerse yourself in the beauty of our city. Enjoy your stay!"

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Peretola Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal of Lucca Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal used for low-cost airlines and charter flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, serving domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Galileo Galilei Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
